overview: Raven Zachary is President of Small Society, working with big brands, established companies, investors, and startups on iPhone strategy and product development. Raven directed the Obama ‘08 for iPhone application for the Obama Campaign, and has worked with companies such as Whole Foods MarketÂ®, Zipcarâ„ , CLIF BARÂ®, and Air New Zealandâ„  on iPhone application initiatives.
